name: Cave Mimic
description: The Cave Mimic has the ability to blend in with its surroundings as an object or terrain feature, appearing as an innocuous part of the environment.
memorable: Its ability to grapple and adhere to creatures makes it particularly dangerous, as unsuspecting adventurers can find themselves trapped.
goals: To ambush unsuspecting creatures and create chaos on the battlefield.
relations: Related to other mimics and creatures that dwell underground; it may serve as a guard or a trap for more intelligent masterminds.
environment: Typically found in caves and underground tunnels.
strengths: High Strength (20) and Constitution (18) provide both offensive and defensive capabilities.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity (8) and Intelligence (5) make it clumsy and less strategic in combat.
attacks: Can attack with multiple pseudopods, dealing bludgeoning damage and using its adhesive ability to grapple targets.
most_powerful_ability: Adhesive ability allows it to entrap and grapple anything that touches it.
senses: Possesses darkvision and tremorsense, allowing it to detect movement through vibrations.
skills: Has proficiency in perception, aiding its awareness of the environment.
additional_information: Can change shape into any gargantuan object.
Able to burrow through solid rock, leaving a tunnel.
Has an ambush ability due to its False Appearance.
Can launch harpoon-like pseudopods that inflict piercing damage.
Immunities to acid damage and being knocked prone.
test_queries: monster that creates tunnels in rock
monster that adheres to its victims
